snippet: In “Coming Together/Attica,” a United States premiere, the Brooklyn artist Rebecca Lazier plans to take full advantage of the sprawling third-floor loft at the Invisible Dog Art Center.
lead_paragraph: In “Coming Together/Attica,” a United States premiere, the Brooklyn artist Rebecca Lazier plans to take full advantage of the sprawling third-floor loft at the Invisible Dog Art Center.

headline.main: Eager for Release on a Big Stage
headline.print_headline: Eager for Release On a Big Stage
